item.title: Saradomin Sword Ints [REL] + PIiicz :)
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

If you want the exact ints, replace the zooms and rotations bit with these.

class8.anInt181 = 2151; //zoom increase will make it smaller
class8.anInt190 = 636; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you
class8.anInt198 = 1521; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle
class8.anInt169 = 0; // model offset increase to move to the right
class8.anInt194 = 3; //model offset increase to move up
class8.anInt204 = 0;

Taken straight from runescape, therefore they are perfect.

Read full topic

item.title: Saradomin Sword Ints [REL] + PIiicz :)
item.dc:creator: @the1337legend the1337legend
item.description:
@the1337legend wrote:

ok well ive been pissed at all these ss inv model views its quite aggravating so i made my own, i tried to get them the same as rs, but i couldn’t get the model to rotate the way it is on rs but its VERY close

if(i == ****){ class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Weild"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 0; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 0; class8.anInt174 = ****;//item look // class8.anInt181 = 2250; class8.anInt190 = 1400; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = 1; class8.anInt194 = 1; class8.anInt175 = 29; class8.anInt197 = 87; class8.anInt165 = ****; // class8.anInt200 = ****; // class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Saradomin Sword "; class8.aByteArray178 = "A blessed sword used by the saradomin god kree'arra.".getBytes(); }

THIS WAS RELEASED JUST TO HELP ANYONE WHO WANTS THE CLOSEST INTS


EDIT- ok if your ss does not look like the one in the pics, then ull need my inv model, ill upload it in a min, and will only post if people post and say it doesn’t look the same.

EDIT 2 - b.c of cj, if you want the EXACT rs ones here it is D:

if(i == ****){ class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Weild"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 0; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 0; class8.anInt174 = ****;//item look // class8.anInt181 = 2151; //zoom increase will make it smaller class8.anInt190 = 636; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you class8.anInt198 = 1521; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt169 = 0; // model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = 3; //model offset increase to move up class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt175 = 29; class8.anInt197 = 87; class8.anInt165 = ****; // class8.anInt200 = ****; // class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Saradomin Sword "; class8.aByteArray178 = "A blessed sword used by the saradomin god kree'arra.".getBytes(); }
